segments.text: OK darling , got some pizzas , potato chips , hot dogs and lots of cheese !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh John , I thought we said we would start eating right ! Remember ? Our new healthy lifestyle ? That ’ s all junk food !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Humph ! Right , so what did you get ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , healthy food , of course ! I got some whole wheat bread , skimmed milk , fresh fish and organic carrots ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Organic ? What ’ s organic ? Do we need organic carrots ... ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They were grown without using any chemicals that are harmful to our health . And yes , John , we need organic carrots ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , so organic vegetables are the green option , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yup , better for the environment and better for us !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a minute , that ? ... Doughnuts ? They organic doughnuts , Kelly ?
segments.speaker: S1
